snippet.title: Blue Boy: Bleeding Out Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1172150/Blue_Boy_Bleeding_Out/
itch.io: https://plufmot.itch.io/blue-boy-bleeding-out

Blue Boy: Bleeding Out is a short but challenging platformer where you bleed as you run. You must avoid touching your bloody path on the way to the exit.

Soundtrack also available!
Bandcamp: https://famicrush.bandcamp.com/album/blue-music-for-blue-boys-blue-boy-bleeding-out-ost
Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/playlists/view/2d622c7b3403b655e018c060cef9877b


My Links:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/plufmot
Website: https://www.bennyrenya.com/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@plufmot
Newgrounds: https://plufmot.newgrounds.com/
Redbubble: https://www.redbubble.com/people/plufmot/shop
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?publisher=plufmot
